attributes.action: Make remain voters accept a majority decision as defeat, the country has spoken
attributes.additional_details:
We as a country are divided in opinion but must now re group and make Britain great again. People don't like change, change scares people. The unknown would still be the unknown if we had voted to stay.
The decision to leave is like learning to ride that bike again at first unsteady with help and guidance but once mastered sat upright face forward with a direct focus and no looking back. God save the Queen.
attributes.background: We as a free spoken country have spoken and voted in favour of of leaving the EU, we should not and will not have to vote again once the decision to leave has been made. Defeat should be accepted after a majority vote.
